subaward_description: THIS PROJECTS INTENDED GOAL WILL BE TO IMPROVE GVI CYBERSECURITY SAFEGUARDS BY: 1. COMPLETING CYBERSECURITY SECURITY ASSESSMENTS FOR TWO (2) GVI AGENCIES 2. PREVENTING UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO THE VIFS LOCAL AREA NETWORK (LAN) 3. DEPLOYING A RISK-BASED VULNERABILITY MANAGEMENT PLATFORM THAT GIVES COMPLETE NETWORK VISIBILITY TO PREDICT ATTACKS. 4. IMPROVING BIT'S MANAGED INFRASTRUCTURE BY PROVIDING AUTOMATION-DRIVEN CENTRALIZED MANAGEMENT OF BIT'S FORTINET DEVICES AND POWERFUL LOG MANAGEMENT, ANALYTICS AND REPORTING PLATFORM THAT PROVIDES BIT WITH A SINGLE CONSOLE TO MANAGE, AUTOMATE, ORCHESTRATE, AND RESPOND, ENABLING SIMPLIFIED SECURITY OPERATIONS, PROACTIVE IDENTIFICATION AND REMEDIATION OF RISKS, AND COMPLETE VISIBILITY OF THE ENTIRE ATTACK LANDSCAPE. 5. PROVIDING ONGOING SECURITY AWARENESS TRAINING FOR THE ENTIRE GVI, PROMOTING AWARENESS AND BEHAVIORAL CHANGE.
